fields.fieldTitle: What's the Moral you want them to get from the Story you'll tell them?

fieldHint.hint1: Completes the phrase "The thing I really want you to take away from this is _______"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sometimes we all need someone to see things in us we don't see in ourselves

fields.fieldTitle: What's the Meaning of the story for them?

fieldHint.hint1: Completes the phrase "So what this means to you is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: we all need to have mentors to help us grow and believe in ourselves

fields.fieldTitle: What is the emotion / feeling you want people to have at the end of your story?

fieldHint.hint1: Completes the phrase "By the end of the story you should feel _________."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: inspired and wanting a mentor

fields.fieldTitle: What do you want people to do as a result of hearing your story?

fieldHint.hint1: Completes the phrase "Now, as a result of what we just shared here, I want you to consider _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: joining my executive coaching program so I can be the one who believes in you and shows you how you can be more than you think you can be
